alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:12PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wyoming, northeastern Erie and southeastern Genesee Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 111 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms from near Alden to Batavia, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause minor flooding in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Batavia, Darien Lakes State Park, Le Roy, Bennington, Alden, Attica, Byron, Stafford, Corfu, Alexander, East Bethany, Cowlesville, and Bethany Center. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
